org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.logical

Class ReadingOrder

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.primaresearch.dla.page.layout.logical.ReadingOrder

  • public class ReadingOrder
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for logical reading order of layout regions. The root group provides access to the actual reading order members.
    Author:
    clc

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReadingOrder(PageLayout layout, org.primaresearch.ident.IdRegister idRegister, ContentFactory contentFactory)
      Constructor

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(org.primaresearch.ident.Id regionId)
      Checks the the region with the given ID is referenced in the reading order.
      Group getRoot()
      Returns the root group (the reading order always has a root group)

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • ReadingOrder

        public ReadingOrder(PageLayout layout,
            org.primaresearch.ident.IdRegister idRegister,
            ContentFactory contentFactory)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        layout - Page layout the reading order is intended for
        idRegister - ID register (for creating groups)
        contentFactory - Content factory (for creating groups)

    • Method Detail

      • getRoot

        public Group getRoot()
        Returns the root group (the reading order always has a root group)

      • contains

        public boolean contains(org.primaresearch.ident.Id regionId)
        Checks the the region with the given ID is referenced in the reading order.
        Parameters:
        regionId - ID of referenced region
        Returns:
        True, if the region has been found; false otherwise
